Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/s:17APPa.name: dataSource
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/s:17APPa.abstract: A data source for the paging scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/s:17APPa.name: pagingDelegate
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/s:17APPa.abstract: The delegate to use for APPagedScrollView events.

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: alignScrollView(with:)
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: Align the current page of the scroll view to the closest or most appropriate one.

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: reloadData()
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: Reloads the pages of the scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: elasticScrollingEvents
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: Whether or not to have movedTo: events include elastic scrolling

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: scroll(to:animated:)
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: Scrolls to the page with the provided index.

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: canGoForward
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: Whether or not the scroll view is currently in a position to go forward

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: canGoBack
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: Whether or not the scroll view is currently in a position to go back

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.name: numberOfPages
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html#/c:@M@APP.abstract: The number of pages within this scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: alignScrollView(with:)
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Align the current page of the scroll view to the closest or most appropriate one.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: reloadData()
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Reloads the pages of the scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: scroll(to:animated:)
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Scrolls to the page with the provided index.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: numberOfPages
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: The number of pages within this scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: pageControl
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Register a page control with the paged scroll view controller so that it automatically changes to match the current page and number of pages correctly.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: elasticScrollingEvents
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Whether or not to have movedTo: events include elastic scrolling

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: pagedScrollView(_:movedTo:from:)
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Called when the scroll view has moved to a new page.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: pagedScrollView(_:movingTo:from:progress:)
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Called during the transition between two pages inside the scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: numberOfPages(in:)
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Asks the data source to return the number of pages in the scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: view(forPageAt:in:)
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: Asks the data source to return the page view for the provided index in the scroll view.

Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.name: APPagedScrollViewController
Classes/APPagedScrollViewController.html.abstract: A utility view controller class that lets you easily setup APPagedScrollView for an entire view controller, providing automatic layout and page control support.

Classes/APPagedScrollView.html.name: APPagedScrollView
Classes/APPagedScrollView.html.abstract: The main paged scroll view class, which allows for an automatic layout of the content provided by the data source and delegates.
